dmca.title: copyright infringement, part 2
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Seska Lee [mailto:webmaster@seska.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2006 6:22 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: copyright infringement, part 2
Importance: High

To whom it may concern,

Once again the following webpages are using stolen images which are the
property of http://www.seska.com. Please have the following images removed
immediately:

webpage http://www.homemadevids.net/homemade_3.html
image http://www.homemadevids.net/homemade/301-homemade_porno1.jpg
image http://www.homemadevids.net/homemade/301-homemade_porno2.jpg
image http://www.homemadevids.net/homemade/301-homemade_porno3.jpg

The next two pages are on a domain with six possible IPs. The pics will only
load if the DNS server returns either of the following two IPs -
70.85.112.66 and 70.85.113.226.

webpage http://hostave2.net/homemadevids/home_porn_126/index.html
image http://hostave2.net/homemadevids/home_porn_126/scr6/2.jpg

webpage http://hostave2.net/homemadevids/home_porn_697/index.html
image http://hostave2.net/homemadevids/home_porn_697/scr/2.jpg

Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, this email serves as
actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings. The
information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury,
I state that I am the owner of an exclusive right infringed by the specified
material.

Seska Lee
http://www.seska.com
